00028 // for string conversions (all LUA functions uses always chars)

00057 class wxScriptFileLua : public wxScriptFile
00058 {
00059 public:
00060         wxScriptFileLua(const wxString &toload = wxEmptyString) { 
00061                 m_tScriptFile = wxLUA_SCRIPTFILE;
00062                 if (!toload.IsEmpty())
00063                         Load(toload);
00064         }
00065         virtual ~wxScriptFileLua() {}
00066 
00067         virtual bool Load(const wxString &filename);
00068 };
